item.title: Monopoly GO: Today's Event Schedule & Best Strategy (May 05, 2025)
item.description:
The Pod Racers event is coming to an end, and Monopoly GO players are scrambling to collect as many Flag tokens as possible. Every second counts as it’s a fierce competition between teams and every Flag token collected brings them one step closer to the top. Those who secure top ranks in the Pod Racers event can claim Star Wars-themed collectibles like the Jabba the Hutt token and Pit Droid shield. This guide outlines Monopoly GO ’s events schedule for May 05, 2025, and provides the best strategy to boost your progress in the Pod Racers event.

Monopoly GO Events Schedule for May 05, 2025

Monopoly GO has a thrilling lineup of events scheduled for May 05, 2025. Check out the sections below to see what's in store.

Solo Event

Here’s the main event starting in Monopoly GO today:

Title

Duration

Time

Oasis Riches

1 day, 21 hours

4 PM EST

Duration

21 hours

Title

Duration

Time

Prize Drop

1 day, 21 hours

4 PM (05/05) - 12:59 PM (05/07)

Flash Events

Here are all the flash events you can enjoy in Monopoly GO today:

Flash Event

Duration

Time

Mega Heist

45 minutes

3 AM - 8:59 AM EST

Builder’s Bash

10 minutes

9 AM - 2:59 PM EST

Mega Heist

45 minutes

3 PM - 5:59 PM EST

Cash Boost

10 minutes

6 PM - 11:59 PM EST

All Monopoly GO events listed here are based on recent trends and are subject to change by Scopely at any time.

Best Monopoly GO Strategy For May 05, 2025

As long as the Pod Racers event is active in Monopoly GO , your immediate focus should be on maximizing your Flag token gains. Remember, you need to secure top ranks on the leaderboard if you want to add the Star Wars-themed collectibles to your Monopoly GO shelves. Increase your dice multiplier when you are a few spaces away from Flag tiles to top up your flags. If you are close to completing property sets, the Builder's Bash is a good time to finish them for the rewards.

Keep working on completing sticker sets in the Star Wars GO album, as they can reward you with dice, which can help you collect more Flags.

item.title: Infinity Nikki: How to Get Unyielding Leather
item.description:
The whimsical Bubble Season (1.5) of Infinity Nikki features an incredible amount of new content for players to try out during the season's duration and beyond. Not only that, there are a variety of new crafting materials to obtain along the way, which can be used to craft some new fashionable items.

One such material in Infinity Nikki is Unyielding Leather, and it'll require you to get into a scrap or two with some fiesty esselings for it. If you're not sure where to find this elusive material, this guide can help with all that it entails.

How to Get Unyielding Leather in Infinity Nikki

Unyielding Leather is one of the trickier materials to obtain in the area of Serenity Island, specifically because there are only two locations where they can spawn on any given day. However, both of those locations happen to be in dungeon caves on the same isle, so at least they're in relatively close proximity to each other. The isle in question is the one furthest south.

One location is the Blocked Cavern on the west side of the isle (easiest to access via the Crystal Salt Main Area Warp Spire). The other location is the Mining Cavern on the east side of the isle, near the Patchwork Clinic (and the Warp Spire of the same name). Whichever you choose, go inside the cavern and make your way through its passages until you find the Competitive Belt esseling (seen above).

These can be a bit difficult to defeat, as they like to use their "fists" to deflect the majority of your purifying orbs. However, taking them down is simply a test of endurance, nothing fancy. Simply bombard them continuously with purifying orbs until one slips through and hits its "eye", taking one of its three hit points. Repeat the process until it's defeated, and you'll receive 1 x Unyielding Leather for your efforts.

One other way to get Unyielding Leather that doesn't involve combat is via the in-game store. Go to the 'Resonance' tab of the store and then scroll through the available 'Surging Ebb' inventory. Each piece of Unyielding Leather will cost you 1 x Surging Ebb (earned with 5-Star duplicate clothing pieces), and can help supplement your stock of the material for your crafting needs.

How to Use Unyielding Leather in Infinity Nikki

Unyielding Leather can be used to craft the special accessory 'Gentle Guidance' , which is earned from 'The Thing in the Mist' quest in Chapter 2 of the Bubble Season storyline. Its sketch requires the following materials:

  • 5 x Unyielding Leather
  • 20 x Bedrock Crystal (Hurl)
  • 30 x Delusional Button
  • 8 x Melancholy Beads
  • 180 x Thread of Purity
  • 52,800 x Bling

Once crafted, you can use it as a cute accessory for your wardrobe, including any of the many outfits released for the Bubble Season. It also contributes to one of the objectives for the Floating Bubbles seasonal challenge, so there's even more added incentive.

6 Images
6 Images

item.title: The Sims 4: Best Celebrity Couples in the Gallery
item.description:
Summary

  • The Sims 4 allows players to download well-made celebrity couples like Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce.
  • Players can create, revere, or torment celebrity Sims in The Sims 4 game world.
  • Celebrity couples like Barack and Michelle Obama and Prince Harry and Meghan Markle can be added to Sims 4 save files.

Celebrities are all around, whether one wants them to be or not. From magazine covers and billboard ads to television and movies, celebrities are here, there, and everywhere in all sorts of ways. In fact, celebrities can now also be found in video games. The Sims 4 has a particularly fun way of incorporating celebrities into the game. Players can download fan-made celebs from the gallery and add them into their Sims world, or they can try their hand at making them in the Sim creator for themselves.

Once the celebrities are in the game world, players can do what they want with them. They can revere them, turn them into everyday people, or make their lives a living nightmare. The sky is truly the limit when it comes to including celebrities in a Sims 4 game, but why have only one celebrity when you could have two? Here's eight particularly well-made celebrity couples that can be downloaded and added to a Sims 4 save file right now.

8 Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce

Sports Meets Pop

  • Created by x63szeulj021
  • Base game only (no expansions or packs required)
  • Over 930 downloads
  • Gallery link

Global pop music superstar Taylor Swift is known for having had multiple relationships throughout her career. A huge amount of her songs revolve around these relationships, hence why Swift is well known for it. Her latest beau is football star Travis Kelce, and the two have been recreated in Sim form here by Simmer x63szeulj021.

This is a great choice of a celebrity couple to download in The Sims 4 for those who don’t have all the latest expansions or game packs, as only the base game is needed to download them.

7 Barack and Michelle Obama

Political Players

  • Created by SimGuruZephyr and SimSane24
  • Base game only (no additional packs required)
  • Over 7,200 downloads
  • Gallery link

Former United States president Barack Obama and his wife Michelle Obama are arguably one of the most well-known political couples in history. They are up there with John and Jackie Kennedy, so it’s no surprise that there are a few different Sim versions of them in the Sims 4 gallery.

This version of Barack and Michelle from two Simmers–SimGuruZephyr and SimSane24– is incredibly accurate in terms of facial features as well as their outfits. The couple could make for a great option when it comes to picking Sims to join the political career path. That being said, it’s also entertaining to just see them casually strolling around the neighborhood.

6 Prince Harry and Meghan Markle

Royal Celebs

  • Created by janakajohnsen
  • Expansions required: City Living and Get To Work
  • Game packs required: Vampires and Spa Day
  • Stuff packs required: Vintage Glamour, Luxury Party, and Perfect Patio
  • Over 1,120 downloads
  • Gallery link

The somewhat controversial celebrity pair, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, can also be downloaded to a Sims 4 save file with this Sim couple made by Simmer janakajohnsen.

The Sims have an excellent resemblance to the real couple, from Meghan’s refined facial structure to Harry’s distinctive red hair and beard. This is another celebrity couple that would be fun to see meandering through the streets in a Sims 4 game as they mingle with the common Sims.

5 Ryan Gosling and Eva Mendes

Hollywood Elite

  • Created by maudhuy
  • Expansions required: City Living and Get to Work
  • Game packs required: Spa Day and Outdoor Retreat
  • Stuff packs required: Vintage Glamour, Cool Kitchen, and Perfect Patio
  • Over 1,600 downloads
  • Gallery link

Ryan Gosling and Eva Mendes are a match made in Hollywood heaven, and they can become part of a Sims 4 game, too, thanks to this Sim family created by Simmer maudhuy. Ryan Gosling is a particularly popular celebrity Sim in The Sims 4 gallery, with many different variations of him having been made by a range of different creators. However, this is one of the only options that includes his wife, Eva Mendes, who is a popular actress in her own right.

This is another choice of a celebrity Sim couple that knocks it out of the park when it comes to getting the features and outfits of their real-life counterparts very accurate.

4 Prince William and Kate Middleton (and the Kids)

Future King and Queen

  • Created by Presko999
  • Expansions required: High School Years, Snowy Escape, Get Famous, Seasons, Get Together, and Get to Work
  • Game packs required: Outdoor Retreat
  • Stuff packs required: Toddler Stuff, Vintage Glamour, and the free Holiday Celebration pack
  • Over 1,240 downloads
  • Gallery link

This next Sim couple is a little different, as not only does it include the couple in question, but it also includes their three children. While the kids are certainly cute and pretty accurate representations, it’s their parents that stand out.

As the future king and queen of England, there are various interpretations of Prince William and his wife Catherine Middleton in The Sims 4 . However, this recreation by Simmer Presko999 earns a place here thanks to the attention to detail and accurate representation of William and Kate in general.

3 Beyonce and Jay-Z

Music Moguls

  • Created by LmpySpcPrncss
  • Expansions required: Discover University, Seasons, and Get to Work
  • Game packs required: Parenthood
  • Over 670 downloads
  • Gallery link

Beyonce and Jay-Z are one of the most famous couples in the music industry, making them a fun addition to a Sims save file. While there are plenty of solo Beyonce Sims in the Sims 4 gallery, only a handful include her husband.

This recreation of the couple by Simmer LmpySpcPrncss is one of the best, particularly when it comes to their Sim version of Jay-Z. The likeness is uncanny in terms of the facial features. Beyonce is also impressive, particularly regarding the attention to detail in her makeup.

2 Justin and Hailey Bieber

Pop Star and Model Duo

  • Created by trropico
  • Expansions required: Horse Ranch, High School Years, Cottage Living, Snowy Escape, Eco Living, Discover University, Island Living, Get Famous, Seasons, Cats & Dogs, City Living, Get Together, and Get to Work
  • Game packs required: Werewolves, My Wedding Stories, Dream Home Decorator, Strangerville, Parenthood, Dine Out, Spa Day, and Outdoor Retreat
  • Stuff packs required: Nifty Knitting, Tiny Living, Vintage Glamour, Romantic Garden, Spooky, and Cool Kitchen
  • Kits required: Poolside Splash, Grunge Revival, Simtimates Collection, Moonlight Chic, and Incheon Arrivals
  • Over 3,740 downloads
  • Gallery link

Justin and Hailey Bieber are another world-renowned celebrity couple, and this recreation of them in The Sims 4 by Simmer trropico is highly impressive. Not only are their faces fantastically recreated, but the little details are on point, too.

From Justin’s facial markings, beard, and tattoos to Hailey’s perfect makeup and well-designed features, this is one of the best interpretations of a celebrity couple in The Sims 4 . The only issue here is that if players want to download the couple in their entirety, they will need to own a lot of the various expansion packs, game packs, stuff packs, and kits.

1 Zendaya and Tom Holland

Peter Parker and MJ

  • Created by maudhuy
  • Expansions required: Island Living, Get Famous, Seasons, Cats & Dogs, City Living, Get Together, and Get to Work
  • Game Packs Required: Parenthood, Spa Day, and Outdoor Retreat
  • Stuff Packs required: Vintage Glamour, Luxury Party, and the free Holiday Celebration Pack
  • Over 23,130 downloads
  • Gallery link

When it comes to celebrity couples, Zendaya and Tom Holland are top tier. Both movie stars grew up in front of the camera, and audiences around the world watched the two of them fall in love through the Marvel Spider-Man films. Their real-life love story has made both Zendaya and Tom Holland all the more endearing, but they are still excellent young actors in their own right.

This is arguably the best celebrity couple available in The Sims 4 gallery. Both have been replicated excellently by Simmer maudhuy, from their facial features to their hairstyles. Spider-Man lovers and fans of Tom and Zendaya are sure to love this celebrity Sim couple, especially since downloading them can add a bit of fame and fortune to a Sims file.

item.title: 8 Most Beloved Mario Characters, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Mario is a gaming icon with countless versions, proving simplicity can create lasting impact.
  • Peach, Shy Guy, and Toad are standout characters that have evolved beyond their original roles.
  • Yoshi is an adorable and beloved companion, bringing joy with his sweetness and cuteness.

The man in red has been gracing the gaming world for over four decades, and the world of Mario has continued to expand with an ever-growing cast of supporting and main characters that seem to know no bounds. Villains turned heroes, sidekicks becoming leads, Nintendo has demonstrated that while Mario remains one of their primary focuses, they are more than happy to explore wider stories through completely different characters.

With hundreds of playable characters, a long list of iconic enemies and worlds, it is hard to pick a favorite among the crowd, as the whole universe is just brimming with amazing people and creatures just waiting to be discovered. But throughout the years, there have been a few standouts that have stood the test of time and shown that they are more than just a simple background piece and have garnered significant appreciation from players of all generations.

8 Princess Peach

A Damsel In Distress No More

6 Images
6 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Super Mario Bros.
9.2 /10
Released
November 17, 1985

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
e
Developer(s)
Nintendo R&D4
Platform(s)
Nintendo Entertainment System
Powered by

Peach started out as a pretty basic character whose entire reason for existing was to be rescued by Mario. Since then, she has been captured and saved countless times, driven around 1000s of race courses, and even had a few standalone games of her own, building up her story as more than just a defenseless princess. She might look elegant, but isn't afraid to get her hands dirty, putting up quite a fight in Smash Bros and showing that she can even save the kingdom when needed.

In her most recent solo game, Princess Peach: Showtime!, players must effectively act out various plays in a long list of settings that each bring a unique ability and costume for Peach to use to take out Grape and her minions. It's a fun title that shows plenty of different sides of Peach and further reinforces that love for the character that spawned all those years ago.

7 Shy Guy

More Cute Than Scary

6 Images
6 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Super Mario Bros. 2
8.0 /10
Released
September 1, 1988

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
e
Developer(s)
Nintendo EAD
Platform(s)
Nintendo Entertainment System, SNES
Powered by

Starting out in a game that didn't even have Mario in the name, Shy Guys have been around about as long as any character in the universe. They began as just another obstacle to overcome, but quickly became a staple in the games to follow, with a loyal fan base growing along with it. Their charm comes from their simplicity and lovable design, a blank expression that elicits far more smiles than feelings of fear.

It's just pure joy whenever the player gets to interact with the character as more than just an enemy to stomp, and any time there is an opportunity to play as a Shy Guy or have them be bigger part of the game, players jump on it straight away and show their consistent love for the small but mighty hooded figure. While other characters might take a bigger portion of the spotlight, there is no doubt that the Shy Guys are one of the most widely adored characters in Mario history.

6 Toad

Putting The Mushroom In Mushroom Kingdom

  • First appeared: Super Mario Bros 1985

The squishy-headed icon that has shown his face over 100 times, Toad is one of the franchise's most widely known and appreciated characters, and for more than just his appearance. His place in the story is normally as a kind of guide or a helper to the player, assisting them through their adventures or providing information that can be valuable in progression and understanding what to do next.

But he has grown to become so much more than that, having his own title that focuses more on clever puzzles and movement than platforming, and whenever he shows up as a racer or a playable character elsewhere, he is hotly contested for his charm and cute yet courageous personality. A right-hand man at times and a leader at others, Toad in all his forms continues to delight fans of the series and has cemented himself as a mainstay in future games to come.

5 Mario

Not All Heroes Wear Capes

3 Images
3 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Donkey Kong
Arcade
Systems
8.0 /10
Released
July 31, 1981
ESRB
e

Developer(s)
Nintendo R&D1, Ikegami Tsushinki
Platform(s)
Arcade, Atari 2600, Nintendo Entertainment System, Commodore 64, Nintendo Game Boy Advance
Powered by

Mario is practically the poster child for video gaming as a whole. No other character has had as big an impact or lasted as long, and the amount of different versions and iterations on a seemingly simplistic formula seems to know no bounds. One minute he's jumping across a sunny landscape, and next he's blasting off into space to go planet-hopping. The little plumber has done it all and is still ready for more adventure.

Many games and entire series have been born thanks to the success of the franchise, and it all rides on the titular character himself and his basic yet memorable personality and design. It is hard not to love Mario or at least appreciate the impact that he has had on gaming, and despite not being super-flashy, cute, or intricate, he proves that people can still love a character for who they are no matter how big or small.

4 Bowser

He Just Keeps Coming Back

  • First appeared: Super Mario Bros (1985)

Bowser is quite possibly the greatest video game villain of all time, not for his difficulty or complexity, but for his consistent presence throughout half a century of exceptional titles that continue to redefine what a boss should be. The number of times Mario has taken him down, and he just keeps coming back, is not only comedic but a testament to the character's will to take over the kingdom and get back at his arch-nemesis.

When players are done fighting the giant turtle and his family of meanies, getting to play as the bulky and powerful beast is an absolute treat, whether as a heavy kart racer or a tanky bruiser in Smash Bros . His story is just as iconic as his design, and whenever he shows up again as the main villain of the game, players are in for a wild ride that, despite being repeated several times throughout the history of the franchise, is always fun and always a joy to experience.

3 Wario

The Perfect Counterpart

6 Images
6 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Super Mario Land 2: 6 Golden Coins
Platformer
Systems
Released
November 2, 1992

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
e
Developer(s)
Nintendo R&D1
Platform(s)
Nintendo Game Boy
Powered by

A character who started as a villain but has quickly become a fan favorite, Wario is a greedy, brawny foil to Mario, who has quickly carved out his own identity that has made him one of the franchise’s most distinctive and beloved characters. Unlike Mario’s clean-cut heroism, Wario thrives on chaos, disgust, and brute force, often portrayed as a treasure hunter, schemer, or unwilling savior in his own bizarre adventures.

His exaggerated personality and irreverent humor give him a larger-than-life presence that sets him apart from the main cast, and players now expect to see him in the majority of the multiplayer titles, so they can take on the role of the devilish yet hilarious character. Wario's design is as much about aesthetics as it is about gameplay. With a heavier frame, he has a much easier time charging through anything in his way, swapping calculated platforming for a more brawny approach that fans simply adore.

2 Yoshi

The Adorable Companion That Never Ceases To Excite

Your comment has not been saved

Super Mario World
9.6 /10
Released
August 23, 1991

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E For Everyone
Developer(s)
Nintendo EAD
Platform(s)
SNES, Nintendo Game Boy Advance
Powered by

Yoshi is cuteness embodied and pushed to the max. A apple-eating dinosaur that simply loves to be Mario's pet, players have been hopping and floating around on his back for generations, and have had the opportunity to play solely with him on more than a few occasions. His lack of speech being replaced by a repetition of his name, along with some adorable other sound effects, makes him a favorite for those looking for an extra level of sweetness.

The family of dinos comes in all colors imaginable, but the main green Yoshi is the one fans love the most, carrying a sense of endearment and delight that is rarely seen elsewhere in the games. It's always pure happiness when he's encountered in a game level, followed quickly by sadness when players have to say goodbye, but in all the time he is on-screen, the smiles never go away for the warm and cutesy pet.

1 Luigi

It's Called Super Mario Bros For A Reason

3 Images
3 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Mario Bros.
Arcade
Platformer
Systems
Released
July 20, 1983

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
e
Developer(s)
Nintendo
Platform(s)
Arcade, Atari 2600, Commodore 64, Nintendo Game Boy Advance, Nintendo Entertainment System, Nintendo 3DS, Switch
Powered by

Without Luigi, there would be no Mario Bros, and without Luigi, who knows where the franchise would have been taken? Beginning as a secondary character for an extra player to play as, but quickly becoming a mainstay in later games, Luigi has shown the world that he is more than a supportive brother and has taken on threats of all shapes and sizes, all to save Mario and the rest of the kingdom.

His existence in the world of Mario is just as important as any other, and while Mario might be the main man that sits on the front of the covers, Luigi resonates far more with players for his more clumsy and comedic nature and lovable attitude that constantly gets up even when he gets knocked down. A classic and iconic character that continues to help and go on his own adventures after all these years, Luigi truly is the glue that helps keep the games and stories together, and is so much more than just a shadow to his brother.

item.title: Days Gone Remastered: Have It Your Way Walkthrough
item.description:
Days Gone Remastered breathes new life into Bend Studio’s post-apocalyptic adventure with upgraded visuals and smoother gameplay, but at its core, it remains the emotional, action-packed story fans remember. Set in a rugged, freaker-infested Oregon, the game follows Deacon, a drifter and former biker, as he navigates the chaos of a world gone mad.

Alongside his brother-in-arms, Boozer, Deacon faces roving gangs, mutated infected, and personal demons. Amid the chaos in Days Gone Remastered , some missions offer a surprising touch of heart, and none more so than "Have It Your Way." Players are tasked with finding and capturing a healthy dog for Boozer as part of his main quest. Those having trouble finding the dog can use this guide to complete "Have it Your Way" and reap the rewards.

Have It Your Way Walkthough in Days Gone Remastered

"Have It Your Way" is part of Iron Mike’s camp arc and reflects the aftermath of Boozer's brutal encounter with the Rippers, a cult-like gang that worships the Freakers. With Boozer physically and emotionally scarred, the camp doctor, Addy, recommends an unusual remedy to lift his spirits: a dog. The Rippers had been hoarding healthy dogs in their hideouts, and word gets around that there’s still one left that can be rescued.

The game places a general marker on the map, guiding players toward where the dog was last seen. However, this mission doesn’t hand-hold. Players must explore and piece together clues to find the pup, which can be easy to overlook amid the dangers lurking nearby.

To start, ride to the mission marker near a remote log cabin. Park the bike a short distance away, several Freakers are prowling the area, and the engine's sound can draw their attention quickly. Stealth is best here, unless players are loaded on ammo and explosives. Equip a Crossbow or a silenced pistol, and quietly eliminate the threats.

Melee combat is another reliable method, especially if trying to conserve ammo.

Where to Find the Healthy Dog in Days Gone Remastered

The key landmark is the log cabin, identifiable by a broken-down red and blue car parked out front. Behind the cabin, to the east, lies a small shed near a fenced-in playground. As players approach, they’ll likely hear a dog’s frantic whining. One Freaker will be clawing at the shed door, trying to get in. Take it down quickly and clear out any others nearby.

Once the area is secure, walk up to the shed and look for the interaction prompt that appears a few feet from the door. Triggering it will initiate a short cutscene where Deacon opens the shed and comes face to face with an adorable, frightened puppy. Players can enjoy this rare moment of softness in an otherwise grim world.

Completing Have It Your Way will earn players:

  • XP
  • Trust with Iron Mike's Camp
  • 250 Credits.

Best of all, players don’t need to worry about trekking back through the dangers of the Oregon wilderness. After the cutscene, the game automatically fast-travels Deacon and the pup back to camp, where Boozer’s heartfelt reaction to his new companion adds a warm, emotional payoff to the mission.

6 Images
6 Images
